title: Lucky Bajaj
description: Stories about the small, beautiful moments we often forget to notice â€” written from Mumbai, one chai at a time.
author: Lucky Bajaj

about.intro: Hello! My name is Lucky Bajaj. Yes, that's my real name. My parents thought let's give our child a name that wouldn't need a nickname.
about.body: I'm an IT Engineer by education and work in Product Management by profession. But really, I'm just an average guy from Mumbai â€” someone who's trying to keep up with the latest trends while being old-school at heart. I invest in cryptocurrency and pretend to know about them, and I'm starting a blog in the times of Instagram reels.
about.outro: In my free-time I cook, watch movies, nerd about the movies I watched, force people to watch those movies, and occasionally write here about things that nobody gives a bat about. And I wouldn't have it any other way.
